sentences.en: An unguided ramble into its recesses in bad weather is apt to engender dissatisfaction with its narrow, tortuous, and miry ways.
sentences.cn: 天气不好的时候，没有向导带路而独自漫游到谷内幽深之处的人，容易对蜿蜒其间的狭窄的泥泞小道产生不满情绪。

sentences.en: But the miry places thereof and the marishes thereof shall not be healed; they shall be given to salt.
sentences.cn: 只是泥泞之地与洼湿之处不得治好，必为盐地。

sentences.en: They journeyed through rough and miry ways.

words.tran_cn: 使陷于泥坑；使陷入困境
